history.proof: intros Z1 Z2. unfold Z_Zp, Zp_plus. destruct Z1 as [x Hx], Z2 as [y Hy]. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: destruct Z1 as [x Hx], Z2 as [y Hy].
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x : nat Hx : x < p y : nat Hy : y < p Unable to unify "exist ?P ?u1 ?u2 = exist ?P ?v1 ?v2" with "{x : nat | x < p}".

original: intros Z1 Z2. unfold Z_Zp, Zp_plus. destruct Z1 as [x Hx], Z2 as [y Hy]. simpl. apply eq_exist_uncurried. exists (rem (x + y) p). apply div_rem_spec2. apply Nat.neq_symm in Hp. rewrite Nat.add_comm. auto.
